---
title: "Survey Team"
output: html_document
---

```{r, results = 'asis', echo = F}
# sub categories for page
sub_docs <- site %>%
  filter(subsection == "Survey Team")

#cleaned sub categories for page
clean_titles <- gsub(" ", "_", tolower(sub_docs$title))

#list of html files to check sub categories against
htmls <- tolower(sub(".html", "", list.files("docs/")))


#link to html if files exists, otherwise link to forms_files folder
for (i in 1:nrow(sub_docs)) {
  if(clean_titles[[i]] %in% htmls){
  string <- paste0("[", sub_docs$title[[i]], "](", clean_titles[[i]], ".html)", "<br><br>")
} else {
  string <- paste0("[", sub_docs$title[[i]], "](../", sub_docs$url_loc[i], ")", "<br><br>")
}
  cat(string)
}
```
